20110115024219.000|20110115024220.000|CC1|       SO MOVING IS EASIER.

20110115024227.000|20110115024229.000|CC1|       INCLUDING CELEBREX,

20110115024229.000|20110115024231.000|CC1|    OF HEART ATTACK OR STROKE,  
20110115024231.000|20110115024231.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:42:00 of 1:00:00
20110115024231.000|20110115024233.000|CC1|     WHICH CAN LEAD TO DEATH.
